definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.chinese: 左外鋒，17歲就爲曼聯初次登場。

sentences.english: Since I left I have probably changed my view.
sentences.chinese: 當我離開曼聯後，我的看法或許已經改變了。

sentences.english: "We're disappointed with this result, " Vida told MUTV .
sentences.chinese: “我們對結果很失望，”維迪奇告訴曼聯電視。

sentences.english: "United are still one of the best clubs in the world, " Cantona said.
sentences.chinese: 坎通納認爲曼聯仍然是這世界上最偉大的俱樂部之一。

sentences.english: I truly hope that Wayne Rooney remains a Manchester United player.
sentences.chinese: 我真心地希望路尼留在曼聯。

sentences.english: Manchester United have won the top division title in England no less than 19 times.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯在以往的英格蘭頂級聯賽中至少成功奪魁19次。

sentences.english: "When I've played I think I've done well, " he said, speaking to United's matchday programme.
sentences.chinese: “我覺得踢得不錯，”他在曼聯的觀賽指南中說。

sentences.english: Marshalled by Ferdinand and Wes Brown, however, United's defence rarely creaked under the Latics' pressure.
sentences.chinese: 由於有費迪南德和布朗坐鎮，曼聯的防線還算穩固。

sentences.english: Summer signing Chris Smalling says he's enjoyed every minute of life so far as a Manchester United player.
sentences.chinese: 夏季簽約的斯馬林說自己熱愛在曼聯的每一分鐘。

sentences.english: Man United, on the other hand, were looking ominous.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，曼聯看起來是一個惡兆。

sentences.english: United have been drawn at home to Wolverhampton Wanderers in the third round of the Carling Cup.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯在聯賽盃第三輪的比賽裏抽中了狼隊。

sentences.english: The Reds head west in mid-July for the first time since 2004.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯7月中旬就要自2004年以來第一次西行。

sentences.english: Manchester United players celebrate Nani's opening goal. Photograph: Tom Jenkins
sentences.chinese: 曼聯球員慶祝納尼的首開紀錄。

sentences.english: The former Manchester United player's contract with Los Angeles Galaxy runs out at the end of December.
sentences.chinese: 前曼聯球星與洛杉磯銀河隊的合同12底就將到期。

sentences.english: Next up for the Reds is the visit of Huddersfield Town to Carrington at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯的下一場比賽是本週末主場迎戰哈斯菲爾德。

sentences.english: Inter Milan midfielder Wesley Sneijder admitted that he was "close" to joining Manchester United this summer.
sentences.chinese: 國米中場斯內德承認自己今夏很接近轉會曼聯。

definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
